specifications.title: Archetype Technology Overview
specifications.summary: Overview of archetype technology, basic semantics, types of artefact, parsing, compiling etc.
specifications.micro_summary: Business case for archetyping; overview of archetype specifications

specifications.title: Archetype Definition Language 2 (ADL2)
specifications.summary: Archetype Definition Language 2 (ADL2): includes differential specialisation, terminology integration.
specifications.keywords: EHR, ADL, AOM, health records, archetypes, constraint language, ISO 13606, openehr

specifications.title: Archetype Object Model 2 (AOM2)
specifications.summary: Archetype Object Model 2 (AOM2) - full computable model of Archetypes and Templates. Includes uniquely identified formally testable validity conditions (suitable for output by compilers), revised primitive types, improved terminology section, and constraint model extended to represent differential archetypes. (ISO 13606-2:2019)
specifications.keywords: EHR, ADL, AOM, health records, archetypes, constraint language, ISO 13606, openehr

specifications.title: Operational Template 2 (OPT2)
specifications.summary: Specification of the Operational Template 2 (OPT2) format.
specifications.keywords: EHR, ADL, AOM, health records, archetypes, constraint language, ISO 13606, openehr

specifications.title: Archetype Identification
specifications.summary: Formal model of identifiers, versioning and lifecycle for archetypes, templates and terminology subsets.

specifications.title: Archetype Definition Language 1.4 (ADL1.4)
specifications.summary: Abstract syntax specification for Archetype Definition Language (ADL), 1.4 edition of language (ISO 13606-2:2008).
specifications.keywords: EHR, ADL, AOM, health records, archetypes, constraint language, ISO 13606, openehr

specifications.title: Archetype Object Model 1.4 (AOM1.4)
specifications.summary: Archetype Object Model (AOM) 1.4 - syntax-independent model of archetypes corresponding to ADL 1.4.
specifications.keywords: EHR, ADL, AOM, health records, archetypes, constraint language, ISO 13606, openehr

specifications.title: Operational Template 1.4 (OPT)

specifications.title: openEHR Archetype Profile
specifications.summary: Legacy specification of plug-in semantics for AOM 1.4 (replaced by standard semantics in AOM 2).
